sentence.Network_en: It was just a passing comment, he didn't go on about it.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只是一笔带过的评论，他没有继续论述。

sentence.Network_en: Over coffee, she lit a cigarette, her eyes daring him to comment.
sentence.Network_cn: 喝咖啡时，她点燃了一支烟，用挑衅的眼神看着他，谅他也不敢吭声。

sentence.Network_en: The offending comment was in fact a heckle from an audience member.
sentence.Network_cn: 这番冒犯性的话实际上是一名观众的诘难。

jx.jx_en_mean: used in refusing to answer a question, especially in a sensitive situation
jx.jx_cn_mean: 无可奉告（尤用于在敏感情况下拒绝回答问题）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the senses 'expository treatise' and 'explanatory note'): from Latin commentum 'contrivance' (in late Latin also 'interpretation'), neuter past participle of comminisci 'devise'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 Comment 对象表示文档中注释节点的内容。 Comment 对象 Comment 对象表示文档中注释节点的内容。 Comment 节点表示 HTML 或 XML 文档中的注释。 使用由 CharacterData 接口继承的 data 属性，或使用由 Node 接口继承的 nodeValue 属性，可以访问注释的内容。（即 <!-- 和 --> 之间的文本）。使用由 CharacterData 接口继承的各种方法可以操作注释的内容。 Comment 对象属性Comment 对象方法

entry.def: If you comment on something, you give your opinion about it or you give an explanation for it.

example.ex: So far, Mr Cook has not commented on these reports...
example.tran: 到目前为止，库克先生仍未就这些报道发表评论。

example.ex: Stratford police refuse to comment on whether anyone has been arrested...
example.tran: 斯特拉福德警方拒绝对是否已有人被捕一事发表任何评论。

entry.def: A comment is something that you say which expresses your opinion of something or which gives an  explanation of it.

example.ex: He made his comments at a news conference in Amsterdam...
example.tran: 他在阿姆斯特丹的记者招待会上发表了意见。

example.ex: I was wondering whether you had any comments about that?...

entry.tran: (通常是不好的事的)体现，写照
entry.def: If an event or situation is a comment on something, it reveals something about that thing, usually something bad.

example.ex: He argues that family problems are typically a comment on some unresolved issues in the family.
example.tran: 他认为各种家庭问题通常都反映出家庭内部存在一些有待解决的矛盾。

entry.tran: 无可奉告(通常用于回答记者的提问)
entry.def: People say 'no comment' as a way of refusing to answer a question, usually when it is asked by a journalist.

example.ex: No comment. I don't know anything.
example.tran: 无可奉告。我什么都不知道。

means.word_mean: 1. a statement that expresses a personal opinion or belief;

sentences.sentence: "from time to time she contributed a personal comment on his account"

means.word_mean: 2. a written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material;

sentences.sentence: "he wrote an extended comment on the proposal"

means.word_mean: 3. a report (often malicious) about the behavior of other people;
1. make or write a comment on;

sentences.sentence: "he commented the paper of his colleague"

means.word_mean: 3. provide interlinear explanations for words or phrases;

sentences.sentence: "He annotated on what his teacher had written"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 焦躁不安的,失去理智的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+ment思考,神智+ed……的→去掉理智

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment思考,神智+al……的→adj.精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
a无+ment思考,神智+ia病→无智力的病
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment注释+ary表名词→n.注释, 解说词
mental精神的+ity表名词→n.心理,意识

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment心智+ation表名词→n.精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
ment思考,神智+ion表名词→有思考→向导,提到[词性变化:作动词]
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment[n.注释,评论,意见 v.[on]注释,评论]+ate表动词→v.作实况报道,评述

Sentence.sentence: The best comments are then sorted democratically by a voting system, meaning that your social learning experience is shared with the best and brightest thinkers.
One additional advantage of the interactive digital textbook is that students can download relevant critical comments.
students can download relevant critical comments.
How does the author comment on Peter Smith's new book?

means.word_mean: 评论, 意见, 解释, 批评

sentences.en: The discovery is hardly commented by the press.
sentences.cn: 新闻界对该发现几乎未加评论。

sentences.en: Joan commented that it was a better play than usual, and I agreed.
sentences.cn: 琼评论说这场比赛比以往打得好, 我表示赞同。

sentences.en: We asked the teacher to comment his decision.
sentences.cn: 我们请求老师解释一下他的决定。

sentences.en: Would you care to comment on why you voted against the new housing project?
sentences.cn: 对您投票反对新住宅规划的原因您愿意解释一下吗?

sentences.en: I won't comment on what people say.
sentences.cn: 对人们说的话我不作评论。

jushi.english: Have you any comments on the proposal?
jushi.chinese: 对这个建议你有何看法?
